## Description {#details}

Holds functions to get, set or test bitfields.

### set() {#aac5c44667e3b3ebe2ed424dbd12a35d5}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Bitfield, typename StorageType&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static void llvm::Bitfield::set (StorageType &amp; Packed, typename Bitfield::Type Value)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Sets the typed value in the provided <code>Packed</code> value.

The method will asserts if the provided value is too big to fit in.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h/#l00270">270</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h">Bitfields.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### test() {#ad10aaa16d68da707e37334ca43baaf2b}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Bitfield, typename StorageType&gt;</>}
  prototype="static StorageType llvm::Bitfield::test (StorageType Packed)"
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Return a non-zero value if the field is non-zero.

It is more efficient than <code>getField</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h/#l00262">262</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h">Bitfields.h</a>.
